Detailed Description

Parameters of APSME-AUTHENTICATE.request primitive. See ZigBee Specification r19, Table 4.28, page 471.

Field Documentation

ExtAddr_t APS_AuthenticateReq_t::partnerAddress

[LE] The extended, 64-bit IEEE address of the counterpart device in the entity authentication request.
